PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-07682010-06-17,  ,  HEALTH,  , 
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (1560- Food Additives)
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (1560 - Food Additives) in order to enable the use of enzymes produced from the following genetically modified and conventional sources of micro-organisms: - Aspergillus oryzae: AI-11 (pBoel 960), BECh2#3 (pCaHj559), (MStr115) (pMStr20) and (pPFJo142), - Aspergillus niger (pCaHj600/ MBin118#11), - phospholipase obtained from Streptomyces violaceoruber.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0143 Publication Date: 2010-07-07
AttachmentsAttachment
